message: ekola - od danes naprej vam je na vsak dan od 18h-24h voljo IL2 - Sturmovik Forgoten Battles dedicated server; do njega je moč dostopati prek  UBI.comovega vmesnika - zaradi lažje prepoznavnosti je server poimenovan "www.slo-tech 1.22", čeprav ne domuje na slotechovih strežnikih; omejen je na 8 igralcev, sčasoma upam da bodo nove mape; pingi so od 30 - 60 (ADSL); vklopljen je autokick (pingi nad 300);  nastavitve serverja (1- vklopljeno, 0 - izklopljeno): SeparateEStart 1 ComplexEManagement1 EngineOverheat 1 TorqueGyroEffects 1 FlutterEffect 1 WindTurbulence 1 StallsSpins 1 Vulnerability 1 BlackoutsRedouts 1 RealisticGunnery 1 LimitedAmmo 1 LimitedFuel 1 CockpitAlwaysOn 0 NoOutsideViews 0 HeadShake 1 NoIcons 0 NoPadlock 0 Clouds 1 NoInstantSuccess 1 TakeoffLanding 1 RealisticLandings 1 NoMapIcons 1 NoMinimapPath 0 NoSpeedBar 0   Potrebujete torej zadnji 1.22 patch in obilo dobre volje.  Povezava na domačo stran  Povezava do serverja s home-made filmi  Vabljeni vsi sobni piloti
super!  samo, se ti ne zdi, da si s malo sfalil težavnost?  imaš vklopljen CEM in separate engine start, hkrati pa imaš (možnost) izklopljenega kokpita, speedbar, padlock in pogled od zunaj...
Ma kdo kaki nasvet za nooba? Jaz skoraj nič ne zadenem

JamiroQ - dokler Oleg & njegova banda ne spedenajo cockpit pogleda (da se ne bo glava samo vrtela) ostajam pristaš tega, da se da izklepljat...  ; outside view je skoraj povsod vklopljen (razen kak extremni klanski server); CEM je pa fina stvar - se da iztisnit "zadnje konje" iz motorja :-))) lahko pa spedenamo drugače, če bo želja. Včeraj je zadeva laufala od 14h naprej - je bilo kar polno (zvečer - še sam nism mogu gor... sem moral počakat da je odpikalo enega s previsokim pingom )   @assistant_1 - leti leti leti; sej bo šlo; FB ni igra, kjer nepreduješ v enem tednu, ampak gre nekak takole:  1. dan - nič jasno, še vzleteti je težko 1. teden - se prebijaš čez komande 1. mesec - stopnja ko odnehaš (obupaš), ali letiš naprej; in potem pride: 3. mesec - brskaš po FB forumu, bereš ww2 knjige, letiš zmeraj bolje; odkrivaš nove sposobnosti letal, nove manevre.... 6. mesec - postaneš odvisnež   lahko naštimam unlimited ammo, pa boš streljal po mili volji   Mirage - poglej še tale post na FB forumu
No saj bo, saj štirje killi po dveh dnevih igranja verjetno niti ni tako slabo

@user: kaj točno je narobe s cockpit pogledom? edina stvar, ki mene moti je tista debela prečka pri FW-190... lahko pa samo sanjaš, da bo Oleg kaj popravil v IL2; vse spremembe (kot prej omenjeni FW-190 kokpit) se bodo zgodile v Battle of Britain (ki je najmanj dobro leto proč).  na complex engine management pa se bom moral navadit , itak ne bi smelo bit težko, ker zadnje čase letim samo še FW-190 .  bom pa prišel pogledat :)

ma moti me to, da se glava samo vrti (se ne "nagne" do šipe); praktično nič ne vidiš... če so ikone nastavljene na 2km, je pa sploh sranje :-))) Oleg bo popravu - upam... vsekakor je pohvalno, da je ekipa zelo dojemljiva za pripombe in popravke...

a, ti bi rad tak sistem kot je bil v Screamin' Demons Over Europe? tako da si lahko nastavljal položaj glave v vseh smereh? to bi bilo fino, ja, bi se vsaj dalo pogledat mimo ogrodja v kokpitu...  btw  tule je kar dobra razlaga Complex Engine Managementa (+ še nekaterih drugih reči).

afaik je Ace Pack uradni UBIjev dodatek za FB, v katerem bodo popravki, nova letala (tako AI kot igralska) in mape.  pol maš pa še neuraden dodatek Battle Over Europe (ali nekaj podobnega), ki doda nove mape (iirc), skine, kampanje in iirc nov generator dinamične kampanje, vse to na temo zahodne fronte (Normandija, mogoče tudi BoB...)  > sam da da not spita pa tempesta, pa bom vesel  ma kakšen spit ali tempest, ne moreš met povsod enih in istih letal met    lahko bi dail notri karkoli iz www.luft46.com ali pa tisto britanski reaktivni float-plane, ki je bil predstavljen na Planes That Never Flew na Discoveryju . Novi update (plačljivi) Ace pack prihaja tudi v Slovenijo - menda tam okoli 18. marca... za pokušino pa "readme.txt"  ---- Il-2 Sturmovik. Forgotten Battles ACE EXPANSION PACK README  Installation Notes We recommend to save all custom built missions and campaigns before installing the Ace Expansion Pack. This is necessary because user-created folders, subfolders or missions may have names duplicating those used in the expansion pack. If you do not back up your missions they may be overwritten by our installation. After the installation you may check your saved missions, rename them if needed and copy them back into the game folder. Attention: If you choose the uninstall option, this procedure will uninstall both IL-2 Forgotten Battles and the Ace Expansion Pack completely leaving only your custom missions, skins or campaigns.  Additional features for ATI 9500+ and Geforce FX video cards (Shaders 2.0):  We've added the following new user options to the conf.ini file that control the water quality  Water = 0, Fastest water, without ground reflection Water = 1, Normal water: ground and clouds reflections, cloud shadows Water = 2, Perfect water: same as Water = 1, plus wavy ground reflections and weather-dependant wave types  1 Ace Expansion Pack list of recommended drivers  1C:Maddox Games recommends the following video card drivers to be used with Ace Expansion Pack with the best graphics options. The game may not function properly with other driver versions due to issues outside our control.  NVIDIA Display Driver Version: 45.33 Release Date: October 9, 2003 WHQL Certified http://www.nvidia.com/object/pc_winxp-2...  ATI CATALYST^™ 4.1 http://www2.ati.com/drivers/wxp-w2k-cat... And old one is also suitable. CATALYST^™ 3.7 Driver Build 6.14.10.63787-93-030812a1-010735c   Designations for Spitfires in the game menus:  Spitfire Mk.Vb with Merlin 45 engine - Spitfire Mk.Vb Spitfire Mk.Vb with clipped wings and Merlin 46 engine - Spitfire Mk.Vb (CW) Spitfire LF. Mk.Vb with Merlin 50 engine - Spitfire L.F. Mk.Vb Spitfire LF. Mk.Vb with clipped wings and Merlin 50 engine - Spitfire L.F. Mk.Vb (CW)  Using the SPB  The SPB consists of the TB-3 mothership and a pair of attached I-16s. There are special versions of these, TB-3 4M-34R SPB and I-16type24 SPB. When building a mission, you can attach the I-16 to the mothership the same way you attach gliders to planes - set up a flight of I-16s with one waypoint, and set the waypoint's target to the TB-3 (go to the Waypoint tab of the Object window with your I-16 selected, hit the Set button and click on the TB-3). The I-16 will be attached to the TB-3 in the beginning of the mission. You cannot build missions where I-16s start detached from the TB-3 and attach afterwards. AI flying these I-16s will automatically detach when the TB-3 approaches a GATTACK waypoint. The I-16s then will attack the site and return to escort the TB-3 back. You may use the "Aircraft Attach/Detach" button when flying these planes to detach from the TB-3, or drop the I-16s if you're flying the TB-3. In dogfight mode, you may attach your I-16 to the TB-3 mothership while on the airfield. To do so, taxi the plane to the attachment port under the TB-3's wing, and press the "Aircraft Attach/Detach" button. Your plane will be attached to the mothership and your landing gear will be raised automatically. Note that while attached to a TB-3, I-16s drain the mothership's fuel reserve, and if their engines are left at low RPM their fuel tanks will slowly refill to 100%.  According to historical sources there were many different versions of the SPB link-up. We only model one of them which was used in 1942 and later.  Using the V-1 rocket  The V-1 rocket is a completely new object type with a new set of parameters. To use it, open Full Mission Builder, load a map, and in the object browser find a Rocket object set. From here you have a choice of a V-1 Ground and a V-1 Air object. These basically function the same, except the Ground object starts on a rail while the Air object starts in mid-air.  You can place an Air V-1 anywhere, while a ground V-1 should be placed on flat ground. Both should be places with no mountains, hills or buildings immediately in front of its path. Pressing Insert or ctrl-clicking the ground places the rocket under the mouse cursor. This is its starting waypoint, one of only two possible. The final waypoint is not created in the same way as plane or vehicle waypoints. Instead you must go to the Rocket tab of the Object window with the V-1 selected, press the Set button, and drag and click the target waypoint on the target area. You can drag and drop it later to fine-tune the aiming.  The rocket always flies to target at around 2625 ±200 meters of altitude; thus for Ground V-1s your target should be far enough for it to climb to that altitude. Usually it's not a good idea to place a V-1 target close to its launch point since it's very likely to miss in this case.  There are more important parameters you must set in the Rocket tab of the object window, namely the Timeout, Count and Period. The Timeout parameter sets the initial time between the start of the mission and the launch of the first V-1. The first box is hours, the second is minutes. It's best to set this value to at least two minutes (0:2) to allow the first V-1 to launch correctly. Setting it to a lower value may cause the first rocket not to launch at all. The Count parameter sets the total number of V-1s launched from the current point towards the current target. If you want several V-1s to launch from the same point but towards different targets, you must create multiple launch points with different targets, and set their Timeouts to different values. Finally, the Period parameter sets the time interval between the launches of each subsequent rocket from this point.  The rocket itself appears on the rail at exactly half the Timeout or Period time; during the other half of the interval the rail appears empty. For example, if the Timeout is set to 10 minutes and Period is set to 20, then the rail will appear empty for the first 5 minutes of the mission (timeout / 2); the rocket will appear on it for the next 5 minutes and launch at 00:10 of game time; then the rail will appear empty for the next 10 minutes (Period / 2) and then the rocket will sit on it for the remaining 10 minutes of the Period; etc.  The last important point is that the V-1 is not an airplane but rather a special other type of object; therefore it will not have a plane-like camera attached to it. In order to watch the V-1s take-off and fly you must place ground cameras around its launch point or across its mission path.  But of course the best way to look at V-1s is from an airplane. Our V-1s are "tippable". They pack a lot of explosives so it's not always a good idea to shoot at one; it may take it with you when it explodes. A better historical way to destroy it is to fly alongside it matching your airspeeds, close formation and then gently touch its wingtip with yours. Since the V-1 has no ability to stabilize itself horizontally it will go into a diving turn and hit the ground below instead of exploding in your face. Good luck!  Using the K-14 gunsight  Use the 'Toggle Sight Mode (Auto)' button to switch gunsight mode. Use the 'Adjust Sight Control to Right' and 'Adjust Sight Control to Left' buttons to select the target aircraft type. Use the 'Increase Sight Distance' and 'Decrease Sight Distance' buttons to adjust the sight circle for the target aircraft to fit in it. Track the target aircraft for at least 2 seconds to maintain correct lead.  Using the Stuvi gunsight  Before the dive in your Ju-87D-5 you must set your dive airspeed (true) by buttons "Increase Sight Velocity" and "Decrease Sight Velocity" and bomb drop altitude by buttons "Increase Sight Altitude" and "Decrease Sight Altitude". When the plane enters the dive you must place the crosshairs onto your target and keep it there. When the plane reaches the preset altitude the warning horn will sound. The pilot should drop the bombs at this point, after which point the plane will be automatically leveled off.  Using the Mistel  We have conflicting reports and pilot accounts regarding the weapons on the FW-190 part of the Mistel. It appears that there were versions with a regular armed FW-190 which could detach and fight, and versions where all armament on the FW-190 was removed. We are only modeling the armed FW-190 version.  The Mistel aircraft in FB is a very peculiar bird which presented our team with some unique challenges. The modified Ju-88 strapped to the flyable FW-190 is really a one of a kind object in the game. On one hand it's a droppable weapon. On another hand it's a player's aircraft since your input goes to its control surfaces. Finally it's an AI plane that has a simple "stay on course" AI routine. And the most unique thing is that it has to exist in all three states within one mission. The IL-2:FB engine was never designed to accommodate such very special objects, therefore we had to make some concessions to make this work.  First of all, our AI routine would need a complete overwrite to allow for complete realistic Mistel operations. Unfortunately we could not afford to spend another year building and testing the Mistel, so our AI Mistels cannot take-off, land or attack targets. The most an AI Mistel can do is follow a set of waypoints in the air, basically serving as a large target for other flights.  Another important limitation is that Mistels cannot be flown in online dogfight games; however they can be flown in co-op missions.  Player-controlled Mistels however do work like other FB planes. You can start on the ground and take-off in them, land with or without the attached Ju-88 bomb, and detach the Ju-88 bomb in the air and launch it at targets. You must launch the Mistel at least from 1 km away from the target; historically they were launched from even farther away. Just lower your engine power to about 33% of throttle, hold your target in the crosshairs for a few seconds and press the Attach/Detach Aircraft button to separate from the Ju-88. It will follow on your current course, while you should try to get away from the target area. The Mistel's blast is pretty big, and it will damage or destroy objects on the ground and in the air in a very large radius.  Creating a mission with a Mistel is easy: just create two waypoints for the Ju-88 (Mistel), then place waypoints for the FW-190A-8 (Mistel). With the FW-190 selected, go to the Waypoint tab of the Object window, click the Set button and click on the Mistel. This will link the two in the beginning of the mission. NOTE: You can set the first waypoint of the pair to be Take-Off, but AI flown Mistels will not be able to take-off.  Additional notes:  - When releasing the Mistel from low altitudes and at a shallow angle, it may hit the ground without exploding. Its detonator was located in the tip of its long nose, so if the Mistel hits the ground with its fuselage without an impact on the nose it will not detonate. - combat/take off/landing flaps will only work on the Fw-190 and not extend on the Ju-88. - when the Mistel hits the ground you may sometimes hear the "I'm hit, I am going down" radio call.   Notes on Ta-152H-1  This plane has two systems of engine boost: GM-1 for high altitudes and MW-50 for low altitudes.  GM-1 should be used at altitudes above 9,000 m 1. If you reach that altitude with the MW-50 Off, you can turn on the GM-1 by hitting W button (default). 2. If you reach that altitude with the MW-50 enabled, then you need to switch it off by hitting W and then press W again to engage the GM-1. Bellow 9,000 m the W key operated only the MW-50 as normal. 3. If the GM-1 was engaged at a high altitude and was not disengaged below 9,000 meters, then the engine will not be damaged as on DB-605s; however no extra power will be gained from the device. This is historically correct.   Notes on He-162 and Go-229  Both the He-162 and Go-229 are equipped with ejection seats. However these are not modern 0-0 ejection seats, and you have a very low chance of survival punching out below 500 meters of altitude or stationary on the ground. Also, try not to eject when flying inverted at tree-top level.  Go-229 is modeled without the historically optional drag chute; you must brake with only wheel brakes as on other planes. We have also modeled small air brakes on this aircraft used for low speed stability and for spin recovery.  Changes in Quick Mission Builder  Changed the Advantage-Disadvantage procedure in code. Now your advantage or disadvantage means 700 m separation in altitude to the enemy aircraft. We also added a new map into the QMB - online "Pacific" map. Note: On the new "Pacific" map in QMB, if you set altitude of flight bellow 1000 m for AI aircraft, some of them may crash in mountains on the way to home base.  ----

The other half says:  "I'm having trouble installing." Even Oleg has commented on this.  Ubi, please:  Confirm or Deny these issues as soon as possible! With the recent oversights in pre-ordering the AEP (resulting in folks that pre-ordered paying more for the product because of shipping, only to receive it AFTER it hits local stores), I would feel it is IMPERATIVE to address issues with the product itself as soon as possible in a clear and concise manner.  Wading through these posts here is NOT the way to communicate with your customers.  If there are issues with either installing AEP over the latest pre-AEP version of FB, let us know what to do!  If there are issues with installing in general, please, make it clear how to avoid this!  Again, if somehow I have overlooked the fact that this has been done, sorry for the inconvenience. I hope that somehow I have just overlooked these things, and I look forward to getting paid so I can buy AEP if and when I can locate it. -----------------------

53.03 GF 4 ti 4200 64.  bom poročal ko bo na sveže naložu..

Moji vtisi:  Ta 152:   Ko sem ga bolje spoznal sem opazil, da bo to letalo trn v peti vsem če ga bodo znali pravilno leteti. Zloben firepower, fantastično dviganje, izredno zavijanje(zahteva zelo nežno roko).... Letenje zahteva potrpežljivost. Vedno se morate nahajat nad najvišjim nasprotnikom. Opozorilo pod nobenim pogojem ne smete pustit, da vas na višini pod 9.000 m preseneti kak mustang ali Thunderbolt, ki bo letel enako visoko kot vi z Ta 152 ali pa BOG NE DAJ še VIŠJE od vas, ker boste v tem primeru postali nemška varianta FAST FOOD-a.  Spitfire:  odličen v zavojih in izreden v počasnem dviganju. Čista konkurenca Zerotu (malo boljše zavija vendar se slabše dviga in je počasnejši).  Lightning:  Hm mešana mnenje treba se ga bo navadit (dvomotorni lovec). Izredno močni motorji, začeten pospešek je nor tudi izredno stabilen v špici lupinga pri hitrosti 50-60 kmh. Dobra oborožitev. Ima pa prav katastrofalno lastnost, če pri strmoglavljanju presežete 700 ga ne morete več spravit pokonci. Lahko vlečete palico kolikor hočete, ne premakne se niti za milimeter. Nasvet: če niste čisto v napičnem strmoglavem poletu se mogoče lahko izvlečete z pomočjo trimanja. Ampak povdarjam mogoče!  Kingcobra: Močnejši motor, boljši pospeški vendar malo manj stabilna kot P-39 Q10. Dobra alternativa z boj proti Bf-109 K-4, ki ima izredno močan motor.  Me 110 G2:  Dvomotorni lovec z strojnico zadaj. Precej dobri pospeški, zelo stabilen pri majhni hitrosti, nor firepower. Zelo dober za B&Z taktiko, vendar ne smete biti prehitri. Po napadu na nasprotnika ko se obrnete nazaj v nebo, začne zdnji strelec veselo streljat po tistem, ki vas poskuša sledit navzgor.  Ki-84 verzija c: Ki-84 ima verjetno najboljšo mešanico lastnosti od vseh letal. Odličen v zavoju, hiter, dobro se vzpenja, z lahkoto presega 800 km/h pri strmoglavem poletu ob vsem tem se pa še vrti okoli osi skoraj kot FW. Tega ne ponuja nobeno drugo letalo. Edina slabost do zdaj je bila: prevelika občutljivost na nasprotnikove zadetke in šibka oborožitev (2 švohcane japonske strojnice in 2 švohcana japonska 20 mm topa povrhu pa ima še zelo malo municije.) No to je sedaj z verzijo c več ali manj popravljeno, postal je malo bolj odporen kot prej oborožitev pa je sedaj 2x20mm v nosu in 2x30mm v krilih. Res je da 30mm topi niso tako učinkoviti kot recimo nemški MK 108, ampak 2x30mm je 2x30mm. Ko zadanete se nekaj odlomi.   No o drugih letalih pa malo kasneje ko jih bom preiskusil.  LP

Moja najljubša knjiga je Leteči cirkus od Clostermana, tudi saburo Sakai ni slaba.  Kar se pa okretnosti japonskih letal tiče: res so ful okretna, vendar jih mustang pelje scat če se pravilno uporablja. Moraš upoštevat tudi moč motorja in pospeške. Nič ti ne pomaga okretnost recimo Zerota ali Ki-ja, ker ko bom letel z Mustangom se ne bom pustil zaplesti v pasje dvoboje in kroženje ampak bom vsilil borbo pri veliki hitrosti 400 km/h + in vertikali. V tej taktiki pa Mustang poseče vsako japonsko letalo. Vic je pa v tem jaz te lahko prisilim, da se boriš na moj način, ker ti drugega ne preostane, drugače se bom znašel nad tabo. Ti pa mene na žalost ne moreš prisili, da se bom boril v počasnih dvobojih.    Pa pozabili ste na KingCobro, ki z lahkoto sledi Ki-ja v vseh zavojih, slabša je edino v Roll rate-u pri velikih hitrostih, vendar to kompenzira z boljšimi pospeški in hitrejšim dviganjem.   Upam da se naslednji vikend srečamo na netu. Ti bom v praksi pokazal kaj mislim.  LP

Blonde Knight in the Sky misliš? Kakor sem gledal ne. Tud na amazon.co.uk sem gledal pa nič, imajo pa Gallandovo The First and the Last.  No, moram še omenit, da si imel na tem serverju na izbiro ameriške P-40 in P-47 ter B-17, pri Japoncih pa A6M (zero), Ki-84 ter Tu-2.

Krasen server. P-40 in Zero sta bila nasprotnika, P-47 in Ki-84 pa nikoli. Če se srečate na majhni višini nima P-47 šanse proti Ki-84, čisto drugače je če bi se srečala na 7.000 metrih ali višje. Tam je P-47 kralj. Kje si pa našel ta server? P-47 je zelo specifičen za letenje. Pri strmoglavem poletu recimo prehiti vsa letala, ki letijo v IL-2 FB. Vsi tudi reaktivci se razpadejo pri 1100 km/h. P-47 pa gre skoraj 1200 km/h navzdol.  Je pa res, da moraš vedno imeti prednost v višini , razen nad 7.000 m kjer leti naravnost fantastično. Pač višinski lovec in treba, ga je leteti v skladu z tem. Čisto B&Z letalo.  Kar se tiče primerjave Zero - P40 pa: Probaj leteti z Zerom 400 km/h+ in se zavrti okoli osi. Isto ponovi z P40, takrat boš videl kako se da zera znebit. V vsem drugem pa je Zero fantastičen. Zavija tako ostro, da se še Spitfire-u komot zavrtiš po notranji krožnici in ima odlične pospeške.   Vsi imajo svoje dobre in slab elastnosti. To dela ta špil tako zanimiv.  Bartman od kje pa si?  LP

Gorazd, zdravo!  Se ti javljam na mejlček, poslan Triglavu vis a vis LAN partya na morju. Odgovor je da, seveda, takoj :) Ti pošljem mejl, ko se pogovorim z ostalimi PE člani. Trnk v forum sem že vrgu.  Anyway, za vse vas letalce IL2 FB pa par informacij, da se ne boste preveč lovili:   http://www.partizanska-eskadrila.com  člani iz cele bivše Juge, pa par ostalih s celga sveta. Pogovorni jezik angleščina (al pa slovensko, če nas je dost, samo itak nima smisla, v zraku je učinkovita le angleščina, brevity code/izrazoslovje pa te zadeve...Saj veste: "this is no.5, no.4, check boogie on your 8 high, alt 40, v240 blah blah. Zdaj pa to prevedte v slovenščino, lol.) PE forum najdete tule: http://tc12f.phpnet.org/forum/pe/index....  Na PE FTP serverju boste pa našli manuale za letenje posameznih letal v FB, navodila za air-gunnery - ciljanje tarč v zraku (nekdo je zgoraj spraševal, zakaj nič ne zadane. Ciljaj PRED tarčo, metki neki časa rabjo do tja, in tarče takrat ni več tam, ne? Zlato pravilo je, da ko ciljaš PRED tarčo, ciljal 2xtoliko, kolikor se tebi zdi pravilno. Ker VSI premal pred tarčo ciljamo, trust me.), brevity codes za komuniciranje v zraku, formacije v zraku, defenzivne in ofenzivne taktične fore pa kup dugih goodijev.   PE je (upam, lol) pravi naslov za vse tiste, ki so ob čitanju zgoraj navedenih knjig (fine, ja, Sakai rulz!!!!!) poštekal, da ti rit na 5000 metrih reši le in izključno teamwork. Izpolniš prijavnico, izbereš partizansko ime, greš v trenažo, potem pa v boj. Cca. 60 nas je, vedno med prvih 10 po uspešnosti v misijah, tko da niti nismo tko švoh.  ----------------------------------------------------------- Letimo s pomočjo HypperLobby-ja http: //hyperfighter.jinak.cz/ kjer se vsak dan nabere do jurja pilotov. Ubiserverji imajo kup laga. Forget it. Pa 90% je noobov.  ----------------------------------------------------------------------- Pretežno se tepemo v telih dveh virtualnih vojnicah:  http://66.114.65.249/vov/site/main.htm  torej Virtual Eastern Front, tam zelo zelo težko ostaneš živ, eh.   in  http://www.vow-hq.com/ VirtualOnlineWar, podobno, samo da so misije ročno narejene (VEF ima generator, host samo izbere število aviončkov na posamezni strani, njihovo vlogo in voila, misija narejena. Anyway, poglejte si linke pa FAQ)  ----------------------------------------------------- www.teamspeak.org in www.ventrilo.com  sta naslovčka za DL comms software. Brez tega res ne gre. Če ne morš poklicat na pomoč, si mrzu, ne? In ko imaš human asa na riti, pozabi na tipkanje v FB chat vindou. Si že v pretekliku.  ONLINE LETENJE:  - join squadron (glej zgoraj, to ne bo problem); - use comms; - treniraj z boljšimi in poslušaj njihove nasvete. Oziroma ukaze, se bolj prime. Pri nas je inštruktor PE_Martin, drgač bivši RL inštruktor na Orlu in MiGu v ex JNA. Se mi zdi, da kr neki ve, hehe.  - be afraid. very. or u die  - NE LETET DRUGAČE KOT NA FULL-REAL + SPEEDBAR (pa še to le zarad tega, ker se kompasa ne vidi dobr).  Zakaj? Ko sem sam 2 leti nazaj začel, sem bil hudo pameten in na začetku uporabljal pomagala, češ, počas pa zihr, bom šel na vedno težje. Big mistake. Slej ko prej boste prišli do stopnje, ko vas drugo kot full real ne bo zanimal. Problem bo seveda, da boste takrat avion sicer dobr peljal, obenem pa kurl mašino, ker ne boste navajeni na CEM al' pa kej v tem stilu, pa orientacije ne bo, ker bo kabina naokoli, ne pa tist arkadš front view.  Anyway, da ne pametujem, pri meni, in enako velja za vse ostale, je bilo takole: baby steps-baby steps-frustracija-now what? Potem pa prešaltaš na full real in voila, learning curve se izstreli pod strop. No joke.  In ko enkrat prvič PRISTANEŠ po fullreal coop misiji, recimo VEF, 16 proti 16 lovcev pa par bomberjev še srečaš, poka povsod, predvsem pa po tebi, to je jasno, takrat šele res uživaš. Se splača najprej mal matrat.  Dogfight serverji so pa kvečjemu za ogrevanje pred coop misijami. Tisti klasični furballi z 10-20 avioni v DFserverju se v coop misijah ne dogajajo. Razlog? Simple. U die.  Skratka, hop na HypperLobby, najdl me boste pod PE_Niko ali FZG_Niko (ja, tud za švabe letim, tisti njihovi autobahn avioni so tok fejst), če vam kaj ne bo jasno, page me. Al' pa kogarkoli od ostalih PE članov, nice bunch, radi pomagajo.  Salute!  PE_Niko   P.S. AEP je pred patchem POPOLNOMA neuporaben. Letite 1.22, čez 14 dni bo pa patch za AEP zunaj, potem bodo vsi šaltal na novo, zaenkrat pa nima smisla.

Zelo odvisno od letala. Jaz navdno odprem ogenj na 200m ali še rajši 150m.   Recimo če letiš letalo, ki ima samo strojnice (Mustang, Thunderboolt), moraš zadržat rafal na nasprotniku za kako sekundo in to iz bližine. Če se greš B&Z taktiko to svetujem da si nastaviš konvergenco za vso orožje na 200m. Streljat začneš nekje na 300m oddaljenosti in zadržiš rafal do 100m, takrat se umakneš navzgor ne glede na izid.  Če pa letiš T&B taktiko potem pa se približaš nasprotniku na vsaj 200m in začneš streljat. Kako dolgo lahko zdržiš rafal je odvisno od količine streliva, ki ga nosi tvoje letalo. Najučinkovitejši pri topovih so deflection shoot-i (streljanje pod kotom), med tem ko se strojnice odlično obnesejo pod katerim koli pogojem. Če igrate proti računalniku strojnice niso tako učinkovite. Proti nasprotnikom na netu so pa grozljivo orožje.   Čelni napadi so specifika zase in vedno tvegani. Jaz navadno letim z Mustangom do razdalje 700m odprem ogenj malo raztresem izstrelke, na 0.5 se pa z hitrim sodčkom umaknem.  Vedno streljam z strojnicami in topovi, razen v primeru da imam en težek top z zelo malo streliva. Recimo KingCobra ki ima 1x37mm, ki strelja zelo počasi in ima samo 30 nabojev in dve težki strojnici. V tem primeru streljam samo z strojnicami če nimam vsaj 90% sigurnega zadetka.  Mislim pa, da nisem noben veteran. Pač povprečen letalec na netu.  LP

Na 500+ metrov boš zadel samo če se pišeš Silvester Stallone in snemate najnovejšega Rambota  no way, sploh pa ne na internetu (prištej še 100-300 pinga); v praksi se izkaže, da se zanesljivo zadeva (s kančkom sreče) na razdaljah manjših od 300m; pa vaja, vaja, vaja... sploh deflection shoot - nekaj o tem je pisal že Niko (glej par postov višje);  Čelnim dvobojem se pa jaz osebno izogibam kakor se le da (včasih res ne gre drugače...);

Čelni napad je recimo najučinkovitejši odgovor na B&Z taktiko. Se pravi če nasprotnik skoraj navpično strmoglavlja nate(Boom & zoom), je kakršno koli manevriranje in zavijanje čista loterija in v večini primerov zanesljiva sestrelitev. Če vidiš visoko nad sabo letalo ranga Mustang ali FW 190 ti priporočam, da poačakš da začne strmoglavi napad, nato se obrneš navpično navzgor(čelno proti njemu) in odpreš ogenj iz vseh cevi.  Moja priljubljena tehnika je B&Z z Mustangom in vem, da so mi trn v peti igralci, ki izvajajo čelne napade navzgor. Vse ostalo je neuporabno, ker te v več kot 90% primerov prestrežem v kakeršnem koli manevru in ti vsej na pol uničim letalo če ne drugega.   Kar se tiče ciljanja pred tarčo pri deflection shoot-ih pa ni vs etako preprosto. Recimo strojnice zadevajo pri relativno malih predtekih. Medtem ko če streljate z FW 190 naciljajte pred letalo za 2 še raje 3 dolžine letala, da ga boste zadeli.  LP

Ok, zdaj ko sem zacel letet imam nekaj vprasanj. Precej sumim, da je moj FLCS ze dotrajan ampak vseeno me zanima ali je fligh model res tak. Letala se nekako cudno odzivajo na komande. Yaw in pitch recimo, najprej dolgo casa nic, potem pa stick se malo premaknem in letalo oddivja v tisto smer, ali pa tudi ne. Level flight je nekaj o cemer lahko sanjam :P (to se mi zdi, da je more or less ok, no FBW...), na ravnost lahko leti samo avtopilot.   Potem so tukaj instrumenti, katerih visibility je recimo malo vecja kot 0. Da bi zvedel svojo hitrost, smer in visino moras uporabljat misko (kar je malo nerodno, ker nimam dveh desnih rok :P)  Kompas je pa sploh stvar zase, saj imam obcutek, da se vrti v napacno smer.... :))  Sem pa razocaran nad grafiko, saj je na AthlonuXP 2000 z 1GB rama in Geforce2 z 65MB Rama zadeva v locljivosti 1024x786 precej pocasna, OpenGL in DirectX mode...  Pogresam tudi sort of 'free flight' mode, kjer izberes letalo in startas na pisti in lahko letas.  Pa tudi 'tutorials' so res samo tutorials, si moras delat zapiske, ce hoces zadeve potem sprobavat... ;)  Grem se malo probavat, mogoce bom celo uspel koga zadet... ;)
> Yaw in pitch  Govora je bilo jasno o Roll & Pitch... Yaw is just fine :)

za roll in pitch si moraš nastavit občutljivost v Hardware Setup->Input; recimo, če daš vseh deset trakcev na 100 pomeni, da bo krivulja občutljivosti linearna od 10 do 100 (ali od 0 do 100, nisem prepričan).  glede kompasov pa: uporabljaj speedbar (tisto v spodnjem levem kotu, ki ti kaže heading, hitrost in višino), ker se pri nekaterih letalih kompasa ne vidi ravno dobro; drugače imaš pa v FB dva tipa kompasov, navadni magnetni (tisti trakec, ki kaže heading v stopinjah) in repeater kompas, ki kaže smer do naslednjega waypointa. ruska letala imajo iirc oba tipa, ameriška tudi, pri nemških je pa vse v enem inštrumentu; repeater je tisto letalce v sredini, magnetni kompas pa je na zunanjem obodu. pri ameriških letalih (vsaj v mustangu) lahko trenutni heading odčitaš tudi iz repeaterja (tisti dve puščici, ki se vrtita).  za level flight pa enostavno drži variometer na 0 ;) sicer bi bilo bolj realistično, da bi letalo natrimal, vendar glede na to, da je trim namenoma pokvarjen nimaš kaj praskat...
